title: Population of Spain in 2019 by gender and autonomous community
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 19 different Communitys on X-axis for 2 groups Male, and Female. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Population.
Community Andalusia had the maximum Population among all 2 groups, and it was for Female. The minimum Population was observed in Community Ceuta for Female.
Community Andalusia and Ceuta had the biggest gap of 4236011.0 between the highest and lowest Population found for Female.
Averaging all 2 groups Male, and Female, the Community Andalusia is the maximum Population and Melilla is the minimum Population.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Population on the Y-axis for 19 different Communitys for 2 groups Male, and Female that are presented on the X-axis.
Community Andalusia had the maximum Population among all 2 groups, and it was for Female. The minimum Population was observed in Community Ceuta for Female.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 19 different Communitys on X-axis for 2 groups Male, and Female. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Population.
Community Andalusia had the maximum Population among all 2 groups, and it was for Female. The minimum Population was observed in Community Ceuta for Female.
Community Andalusia and Ceuta had the biggest gap of 4236011.0 between the highest and lowest Population found for Female.
Averaging all 2 groups Male, and Female, the Community Andalusia is the maximum Population and Melilla is the minimum Population.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 19 different Communitys on X-axis for 2 groups Male, and Female. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Population.
Community Andalusia had the maximum Population among all 2 groups, and it was for Female. The minimum Population was observed in Community Ceuta for Female.
For Community Andalusia, Female had the highest Population among all 19 Communitys and it has the lowest Population in Community Ceuta.
There is a gap of 4236011.0 between the highest and lowest Population found for Female in Community Andalusia and Ceuta.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Population was found in case of Male.
On average, the Community Andalusia had the highest Population for all 2 groups Male, and Female. Whereas Melilla had the lowest average Population.
